presentation.title: Lucas Daher
presentation.desc: I am a Systems Analysis and Development student at the Catholic University of Brasília, passionate about creating amazing digital experiences. With experience in Front-end Development and UI/UX Design, I am always striving to turn ideas into functional and attractive interfaces. Welcome to my portfolio!

aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.desc: With almost a year of experience in UI/UX Design and Front-end Development using React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, SASS, and other technologies, I'm currently in the second semester of Systems Analysis and Development at the Catholic University of Brasília.

skills.title: My skills
skills.desc: Get to know some of my development, design and user experience skills.
skills.focus: Currently, my focus is on Java due to the Object-Oriented Programming course at college.

projects.title: My projects
projects.desc: I present to you a selection of original projects, the result of my dedication to design and development.

alerts.alertHeader: New projects are being added in every weekly update of my portfolio.
